pages.text: The $(mob)Siren$() is a monster found in on $(thing)Siren Islands$() in $(thing)Oceans$(). It sings a song that forces players that hear it to approach it, unless that player is wearing $(item)Earplugs$().$(p)When its prey is close enough, it stops singing and start attacking with melee attacks. It moves very fast in water but is sluggish on land.
$(mob)Sirens$() drop $(item)Shiny Scales$() on death. They can be brewed into $(item)Potions of Water Breathing$().
